sources.title: The Flight of the Phoenix (1965)
sources.description: A cargo aircraft crashes in a sandstorm in the Sahara with less than a dozen men on board. One of the passengers is an airplane designer who comes up with the idea of ripping off the undamaged wing and using it as the basis for a replacement aircraft they need to build before their food and water run out. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-flight-of-the-phoenix-1965/

metadata.Plot: A cargo plane goes down in a sandstorm in the Sahara with less than a dozen men on board. One of the passengers is an airplane designer who comes up with the idea of ripping off the undamaged wing and using it as the basis for an airplane they will build to escape before their food and water run out.
metadata.Actors: James Stewart, Richard Attenborough, Peter Finch
